quotes.Q1: Grow it, build it, save it
quotes.Q2: It’s not your salary what makes you rich, it’s your expending habits.
quotes.Q3: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving - Warren Buffett
quotes.Q4: Saving money is not only about keeping, it’s about knowing how to spend it
quotes.Q5: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you - Dave Ramsey
quotes.Q6: Being a smart shopper is the first step to getting rich - Mark Cuban
